Reviews.Content: travelled husband couple friends arranged private car pick airport email couple days trip travelled mercedes direct hotel 50 euros cheaper 4 train tickets 14 euros fiumicino termini station lady driver typically italian driver sometimes bit survived hotel 2 pm shown straight slightly bigger spacious bathroom jacuzzi bath shower shower bathroom serviced day fresh towels toiletries supplied free safe breakfast fruit juices fresh fruit ham cheese frittata boiled eggs bread rolls croissants types cake choose reastaurants street tried da vincenzo 10 bill steak house da andrea happy fillet steak excellent hotel ten minute walk hop hop tour bus bought 2 day ticket 18 euros whats offer bearings choose world cup swing pietro hotel arranged england match wednesday reserving table bar giant screen trip boring return rome definitely choose crosti
